attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hello!

If matters, i've always supported the increase of UK military mightt, and strongly support the building of the new aircraft carriers. 
I also strongly support the efforts of to implement faster more green and renewable energy technologies.
    About the food prices, i think, that UK , considering the amount of its natural biomass   , can produce easily much more food, and that will reduce the price, not mentioning the reduced food safety risk and carbon footprint of the food. 

    Sincerely : I. Ivanov, M. D.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
